title: Permanently Banned for being Harassed
body: Look, I get that league can get a little intense and people will get mad but it happens. I was permanently banned for cussing someone out for feeding, throwing the game, and harassing me. Trying to talk about my parents and crap like that. I get that i messed up by replying and and initiating the trash talk but after about 10 minutes i stopped for the rest of the game. I stop flaming and got over the heat. I just wanted to play the game but the guy continued to flame me and harass me. But then I'm the one who ended up getting banned?? PermaBanned at that. I would understand like game chat banned or something but I have been playing this game for Four years now. The league community has been becoming worse and worse and the fact that my team stays quite and i speak up to the guy losing on purpose and then he complains to the enemy team that I'm the bad guy? It's ridiculous. All I ask is to reduce my ban, I don't care if its a month or two but I do not believe i deserved to be banned from the game forever. I have spent money and time into this game and I love league of legends, i still remember the first time i played it and how immediately it pulled me in. To be the only one punished and so severely it's just disappointing. I know I messed up and I can Admit to that but all i ask is for one more chance. I would rather never type in game again then be banned from playing at all. Please Consider Riot.

replies.body:
I've noticed that people on this board tend to deal with being permanently banned like a death, they go through the 5 stages, which are 

https://pics.me.me/the-kubler-ross-model-for-the-5-stages-of-grief-according-13885114.png

You get suspended for adding to the toxic environment. Defending yourself is muting the offender and reporting them after the game. When someone retaliates with more toxicity, then they're part of the problem. Others behavior does not give you a free pass to act like them.
But I suggest making a new account and starting over. You have learned your lesson, but now you need to learn that your actions have consequences you can't change. They can't give it back just because you're sorry.
still they all should be ban not jsut one guy idoit roit still stupid

There is a time and a place to be a necromancer, neither of which is here or now.

Please revive the dead responsibly.

you are responsible for your own actions, i understand it's hard when you're being harassed but if you know that you can't see it without raging then mute them, you'll still hear their pings.
also it rarely goes straight to permaban so odds are you have gotten banned before or were extremely bad yourself in chat.(chat logs would help)
And you didn't just mute them because...?
profanity isn't a reportable offense but if your trash talk included something that was just as bad as the harassment from them it makes no difference to riot
It's logical to assume lack of logic because of there not being any

Trolling is punished by a 14 day ban or perma ban first time they are caught. It is just a bit harder to catch.

There is also no issue with freedom of speech here. First off, freedom of speech only prevents the government from restricting what you say. It does not protect you from the consequences of what you say nor does it apply to private companies. Basically, freedom of speech does not force private companies to host your toxicity.

I am not a liberal, an SJW, or a feminist. I just think that we shouldn't be assholes to one another and should try and be tolerable to be around the strangers you get queued with so they can try to enjoy their hobby.
